message.subject: Out of Office - Monday morning
message.content:
M1.1. Shelley,
[Conventional: signature]
M1.2. I will be out of the office tomorrow morning participating in a charity golf tournament sponsored by EDS at South Shore Harbor.
[Inform: Rick will be out of the office tomorrow to play in a charity golf tournament]
M1.3. Mark Giglotti, Jeannie Licciardo, Don Stacy and I are playing together.
[Inform: three others who are also playing]
M1.4. I know the timing may be bad because of the financial project we have been preparing but the charitable contribution to play was quite generous and I do not want to back out of my commitment to the other team members.
[Inform: despite bad timing, Rick made a commitment to team, and charitable contribution is significant]
M1.5. HOWEVER, IF YOU NEED ME FOR ANY REASON, PLEASE PAGE ME AT 1(800) 609-6967 OR CALL MY CELL PHONE AT (713) 569-4140.
[Inform: pager and cell numbers, if Shelley needs to contact Rick]
M1.6. ALMA WILL ALSO KNOW HOW TO GET A HOLD OF ME.
[Inform: Alma will also know how to get in touch with Rick]
M1.7. I will only be 45 minutes away and will be able to come straight into the office, if needed.
[Inform: Rick will only be 45 minutes away and can come into the office if necessary]
M1.8. I will check in during the day with Linda Trevino, as she will be sitting in for me at your staff meeting.
[Inform: Rick will check in with Linda, who will sit in for Rick at the staff meeting]
M1.9. Rick
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Out of Office - Monday morning
message.content:
M2.1. Rick
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. I have a number of contracts that the bankers want early tomorrow.
[Inform: Shelley has some contracts that bankers want early tomorrow]
Sflink2.2
M2.3. I am assuming Elizabeth will be in to help me?
[Request-Information: will Elizabeth be in to help Shelley]
Flink2.3

message.subject: Out of Office - Monday morning
message.content:
M3.1. Elizabeth will be in.
[Inform: Elizabeth will be in]
Blink2.3
M3.2. Also, Linda Trevino will be in the office.
[Inform: Linda will also be in]
M3.3. All
contracts are in Envision as well as in the file room on 39.
[Inform: locations of contracts]
Blink2.2
M3.4. If you need me to be there, just let me know.
[Inform: Shelley should tell Rick if she needs him to be there]
